description:
A lord picks mushrooms. A wife is embarrassed at her family`s meager presents.  Two sculptors compete to see who is the best, but one cheats.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tanizoko no Hiratake / Yome-san no Miyage / Botan no Hana to Nezumi
The Oyster Mushroom at the Bottom of the Valley / The Bride`s Present / The Tree Peony and the Rat
谷底の平茸 / 嫁さんのみやげ / 牡丹の花とねずみ
